The Indian Constitution was adopted on 26th November, 1949.
India lies entirely in Southern Hemisphere.
Assam is known as the "Fruit Bowl" of India.
Indira Gandhi was the first female head of government or Prime Minister of India.
Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel is known as the "Iron Man" of India.
Ram Nath Kovind is the current President of India.
Sikkim is known as the "Land of Rising Sun".
In India, 23 languages are spoken.
Mukesh Ambani is the richest man in India.
Roshni Nadar Malhotra is the richest woman in India.
Correct Answer: \n
The Indian Constitution was adopted on 26th November, 1949.
India lies entirely in Northern Hemisphere above the equator.
Himachal Pradesh is known as the "Fruit Bowl" of India.
Indira Gandhi was the first female head of government or Prime Minister of India.
Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel is known as the "Iron Man" of India.
Droupdi Murmu is the current President of India.
Arunachal Pradesh is known as the "Land of Rising Sun".
In India, 22 languages are spoken.
Gautam Adani is the richest man in India.
Roshni Nadar Malhotra is the richest woman in India.
